Scripts.PostClick: PallyPower:ButtonPostClick(self, button, down); PallyPower:UpdateButtonOnPostClick(self, button, down);

Scripts.OnClick: if InCombatLockdown() then return end if IsShiftKeyDown() then PallyPower:StorePreset() else PallyPower:LoadPreset() end

PallyPower.opt.freeassign = self:GetChecked(); if PallyPower.opt.freeassign then PallyPower:SendMessage("FREEASSIGN YES"); if AllPallys[PallyPower.player] then AllPallys[PallyPower.player].freeassign = true end else PallyPower:SendMessage("FREEASSIGN NO"); if AllPallys[PallyPower.player] then AllPallys[PallyPower.player].freeassign = false end end

Scripts.OnLoad: Mixin(self, BackdropTemplateMixin) self:SetBackdrop( { bgFile = "Interface\\Tooltips\\UI-Tooltip-Background", edgeFile = "Interface\\Tooltips\\UI-Tooltip-Border", tile = true, tileEdge = true, tileSize = 16, edgeSize = 16, insets = { left = 5, right = 5, top = 5, bottom = 5 } }) self:SetBackdropColor(0.05, 0.05, 0.05) self:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 1, 1, 1)
Scripts.OnHide: if (self.isMoving) then self:StopMovingOrSizing(); self.isMoving = false end local LUIDDM = LibStub("LibUIDropDownMenu-4.0") LUIDDM:CloseDropDownMenus()
